taskDescription: Which of the other six D aldohexoses yield optically active aldaric acids on oxidation, and which yield optically inactive (meso) aldaric acids? (See Problem 25-19.)
detailedSolution: <small style="font-variant: small-caps">D</small>-Allose and <small style="font-variant: small-caps">D</small>-galactose yield meso aldaric acids; the other six <small style="font-variant: small-caps">D</small>-hexoses yield optically active aldaric acids.
